resources.string:
Hello, my name is Albert Bocanegra Barreiro, I am 19 years ols and I am from Tarragona.

I am studying the Advanced Training Cycle in Multiplatform Application Development at the iFP Professional Training Institute. I have previous experiencie in the IT area, where I fulfilled my duties as an IT technician and web maintenance with PHP and MySQL. Also, I'm taking a course to train as a server-side programmer, with technologies like PHP, Laravel and Symfony.

I am also learning a programming language called Dart, with is respective framework you can develper desktop applications, mobile applications and web applications (or landing pages).
